profile.name: Yanuar Tri Laksono
profile.title: Android Developer & Software Engineer
profile.description: Android Developer & Software Engineer with 5 years of experience building innovative mobile applications using Flutter, Kotlin, and Java

description: As a software developer with 5 years of experience in building both native and hybrid mobile applications, I am passionate about creating innovative and user-focused digital solutions.

I specialize in Android development, with hands-on experience using Flutter, Java, Kotlin, and backend technologies such as Firebase and Laravel. I'm also exploring the exciting world of Generative AI, applying it in real-world mobile applications to enhance interactivity and automation.
My portfolio includes a wide range of projects, from Bookread AI (a Flutter-based AI storytelling app) to fully automated short video generation tools using AI and text-to-speech technologies.

education.coursework: Logic and Algorithms, Human-Computer Interaction, Mobile Application Programming with Frameworks

responsibilities: Developing cross-platform mobile applications for Android and iOS using Flutter
Building the Bookread AI application, a story creation platform powered by Generative AI
Integrating Firebase Firestore, Authentication, and Cloud Storage to enhance app performance and scalability
Handling the deployment process to both Google Play Store and Apple App Store
Creating and maintaining internal libraries to improve code reuse and streamline development across projects
Developed an Easy Custom Animation library to help the team implement consistent, reusable animations efficiently
Supporting team collaboration by managing tasks, conducting code reviews, and ensuring clean, maintainable codebases
Assisting in the development of an educational math game application for elementary school students, focusing on engaging, gamified learning experiences
Developing cross-platform mobile applications for Android and iOS using Flutter
Building the Bookread AI application, a story creation platform powered by Generative AI

projects.title: VIDCAP - Mobile App
projects.description: A Flutter-based video editing application focused on subtitle overlay and animation, inspired by CapCut's functionality.
projects.longDescription: Developed a comprehensive video editing application using Flutter, allowing users to add subtitle overlays and animated subtitles on videos, similar to CapCut.
features: Built a native iOS library using AVFoundation to export videos with animated subtitles
Created a native Android library using Media3 to render subtitle overlays directly on videos
Integrated OpenAI's transcription API to automatically convert video audio into subtitles
Cross-platform compatibility for Android and iOS

features: AI-powered story generation using advanced language models
Personalized storytelling based on user preferences

projects.title: SPKAIY (Ads Platform App, Cambodia)
projects.description: SPKAIY is a mobile application developed to assist Cambodian citizens in advertising products.
projects.longDescription:
The SPKAIY app was developed using Flutter to provide a platform for advertising products in Cambodia, targeting local citizens. The application features QR code reading and generation, allowing users to create personalized store pages for their products. Throughout the development process, the team faced challenges such as retrieving product data from the server, which were successfully resolved to enhance user experience. Additionally, the user interface was improved by modifying the home page to include various product category components, making navigation easier for users.

The project involved extensive debugging and enhancement efforts, ensuring the application's overall stability and functionality. Developers actively identified and fixed bugs, contributing to a smoother user experience. The app not only serves as a marketplace platform but also focuses on empowering local vendors by providing them with tools to showcase their products effectively.

SPKAIY is associated with Cambodia's largest free open market, bridging the gap between sellers and buyers in a digital environment. This initiative aims to foster economic growth by facilitating easier access to market opportunities for local entrepreneurs.

projects.title: RE-FOOD
projects.description: A food ordering application that utilizes WhatsApp for seamless order placement.
projects.longDescription:
RE-FOOD is a mobile application developed for the KMIPN V competition, specifically designed to facilitate food ordering through WhatsApp. The application allows users to place orders conveniently by reading notifications directly from their phones. This integration ensures a user-friendly experience and streamlines the ordering process.

In the development of RE-FOOD, we utilized Java as the primary programming language, which allowed us to create a robust application that meets the needs of users. The application is integrated with Firebase Realtime Database for efficient data storage and management, ensuring that orders are processed in real time.

To enhance user experience, we implemented a responsive design that guarantees the application's functionality across various mobile devices. This design consideration ensures that users can access the application on any device without compromising usability.

Overall, RE-FOOD showcases our ability to merge technology with practical solutions, making it an innovative tool for food ordering in a competitive environment.
